trans-unit.source: Azure Privileged Identity Management: How To Start a Security Review
trans-unit.target: Azure Privileged Identity Management: How To Start a Security Review

trans-unit.source: Learn how to create a security review for privileged identities with the Azure Privileged Identity Management extension.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to create a security review for privileged identities with the Azure Privileged Identity Management extension.

trans-unit.source: Azure Privileged Identity Management: How To Start a Security Review
trans-unit.target: Azure Privileged Identity Management: How To Start a Security Review

trans-unit.source: Starting a Security Review
trans-unit.target: Starting a Security Review

trans-unit.source: Eventually, you will be able to perform security reviews in other places in the Azure portal.
trans-unit.target: Eventually, you will be able to perform security reviews in other places in the Azure portal.

trans-unit.source: This document covers the steps for starting a security review within the **Privileged Identity Management (PIM)** interface.
trans-unit.target: This document covers the steps for starting a security review within the **Privileged Identity Management (PIM)** interface.

trans-unit.source: Perhaps there are users that you don't recognize, or perhaps a user has changed jobs or projects and no longer require privileged access in their new position.
trans-unit.target: Perhaps there are users that you don't recognize, or perhaps a user has changed jobs or projects and no longer require privileged access in their new position.

trans-unit.source: In order to reduce the risk associated with these "stale" role assignments, you and others administrators can review the roles that users have been given by starting a security review.
trans-unit.target: In order to reduce the risk associated with these "stale" role assignments, you and others administrators can review the roles that users have been given by starting a security review.

trans-unit.source: Paths to Start a Security Review
trans-unit.target: Paths to Start a Security Review

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] If you have not created a PIM dashboard in the Azure portal yet, see the steps in [Getting Started with Azure Privileged Identity Management](active-directory-privileged-identity-management-getting-started.md)
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] If you have not created a PIM dashboard in the Azure portal yet, see the steps in [Getting Started with Azure Privileged Identity Management](active-directory-privileged-identity-management-getting-started.md)

trans-unit.source: From the Azure PIM Dashboard you can start a view by
trans-unit.target: From the Azure PIM Dashboard you can start a view by

trans-unit.source: Dashboard > Security reviews > Review > Review button
trans-unit.target: Dashboard > Security reviews > Review > Review button

trans-unit.source: Dashboard > Roles > Review button
trans-unit.target: Dashboard > Roles > Review button

trans-unit.source: Dashboard > Click on role to be reviewed in roles list > Review button
trans-unit.target: Dashboard > Click on role to be reviewed in roles list > Review button

trans-unit.source: Start a Security Review
trans-unit.target: Start a Security Review

trans-unit.source: When you click on the **Review** button, the **Start to review a role** and the **Select a role to review** blades will appear and the **Select a role to review** item will be selected.
trans-unit.target: When you click on the **Review** button, the **Start to review a role** and the **Select a role to review** blades will appear and the **Select a role to review** item will be selected.

trans-unit.source: Select the Role to Review
trans-unit.target: Select the Role to Review

trans-unit.source: Select role from the roles list in the **Select a role to review** blade.
trans-unit.target: Select role from the roles list in the **Select a role to review** blade.

trans-unit.source: You can only choose one role at a time.
trans-unit.target: You can only choose one role at a time.

trans-unit.source: The **Select a role to review** blade will be replaced by the **Select reviewers blade**.
trans-unit.target: The **Select a role to review** blade will be replaced by the **Select reviewers blade**.

trans-unit.source: You have two options when selecting reviewers:
trans-unit.target: You have two options when selecting reviewers:

trans-unit.source: Me - use this feature if you would like to preview how security reviews work without involving other administrators.
trans-unit.target: Me - use this feature if you would like to preview how security reviews work without involving other administrators.

trans-unit.source: Self review by role members - use this feature to have the users review their own role assignments themselves.
trans-unit.target: Self review by role members - use this feature to have the users review their own role assignments themselves.

trans-unit.source: Select either of these to start working with the review details.
trans-unit.target: Select either of these to start working with the review details.

trans-unit.source: The **Change defaults** blade will appear.
trans-unit.target: The **Change defaults** blade will appear.

trans-unit.source: Review by Self review
trans-unit.target: Review by Self review

trans-unit.source: Name the review by entering the review name into the **Name** field.
trans-unit.target: Name the review by entering the review name into the **Name** field.

trans-unit.source: It is recommended that you give the review a unique name that describes the review and that makes it easy to keep track of.
trans-unit.target: It is recommended that you give the review a unique name that describes the review and that makes it easy to keep track of.

trans-unit.source: Enter a start date for the review in the **Start date** field.
trans-unit.target: Enter a start date for the review in the **Start date** field.

trans-unit.source: Enter an end date for the review in the **End date** field.
trans-unit.target: Enter an end date for the review in the **End date** field.

trans-unit.source: Some things that you should think about when setting the end date for the review are:
trans-unit.target: Some things that you should think about when setting the end date for the review are:

trans-unit.source: How many people are being reviewed?
trans-unit.target: How many people are being reviewed?

trans-unit.source: How quickly will the users be able to add the extension and complete the review?
trans-unit.target: How quickly will the users be able to add the extension and complete the review?

trans-unit.source: Click the OK button in the **Change defaults** blade.
trans-unit.target: Click the OK button in the **Change defaults** blade.

trans-unit.source: It will close.
trans-unit.target: It will close.

trans-unit.source: Click the OK button in the **Start a review of a role** blade.
trans-unit.target: Click the OK button in the **Start a review of a role** blade.

trans-unit.source: It will close.
trans-unit.target: It will close.

trans-unit.source: A notification will appear in the portal main menu, refresh the dashboard by clicking the **Refresh** button and the security review will appear in the **Security reviews** section.
trans-unit.target: A notification will appear in the portal main menu, refresh the dashboard by clicking the **Refresh** button and the security review will appear in the **Security reviews** section.

trans-unit.source: Notify the individuals in the role that they will need to add the extension and then review their own administrative access.
trans-unit.target: Notify the individuals in the role that they will need to add the extension and then review their own administrative access.

trans-unit.source: See next step.
trans-unit.target: See next step.

trans-unit.source: Review administrative access
trans-unit.target: Review administrative access

trans-unit.source: Review by Me
trans-unit.target: Review by Me

trans-unit.source: If you selected the "Me" option as the reviewer, then proceed to the security review.
trans-unit.target: If you selected the "Me" option as the reviewer, then proceed to the security review.

trans-unit.source: For more information about completing the review see [Azure Privileged Identity Management: How To Perform a Security Review](active-directory-privileged-identity-management-how-to-perform-security-review.md)
trans-unit.target: For more information about completing the review see [Azure Privileged Identity Management: How To Perform a Security Review](active-directory-privileged-identity-management-how-to-perform-security-review.md)

trans-unit.source: PIM Table of Contents
trans-unit.target: PIM Table of Contents
